overview:
Austin Grose joined Shasta Ventures with 14 years of experience in venture capital finance, most recently as CFO of Allegis Capital, a $500 million family of funds. His prior experience includes CFO roles with Associated Venture Investors and MK Global Ventures.

Austin began his career as a CPA with Arthur Andersen & Co., where he led audit and tax engagements for clients in a variety of industries. Education

* M.B.A., American Graduate School of International Management (Thunderbird).
* B.A., Business Administration and Spanish, Carroll College
